content.rendered:
beauty bar in yaletown, vancouver | THE TEN SPOT®

welcome to 10spot® beauty bar in yaletown, vancouver. our team is full of skilled experts who know how to make you look and feel your best! we offer a variety of services like waxing, facials, nail care, and laser hair removal. when you visit us, our awesome team will set you on track to taking the steps to feeling #LikeATen®

book now!

buy a membership

beauty bar in yaletown, vancouver | THE TEN SPOT®
  • 1006 mainland street
  • 778-379-5959
  • yaletown@thetenspot.com

Hours

mon. - tue: 11:00 am – 7:00 pm

wed. - fri: 11:00 am – 8:00 pm

sat.: 10:00 am – 6:00 pm

sun.: 11:00 am – 5:00 pm

our beauty bar services

nails

we offer the best mani pedi in town! we offer nail extensions, gel nails, pedicures, and many more.

See services menu

waxing

we offer top notch waxing services designed to make you #feellikeaten like our brazilly®, thongkini®, general full body waxing, and much more.

See services menu

facials

our team has serious skills when it comes to facial treatments. we offer stress-free facial procedures like anti-aging facials, dermaplaning, chemical peels, and many more.

See services menu

brows

what better way to spoil yourself than by getting your brows and lashes done. wether you’re looking for lash lifts, brow lams, or more, we do it all.

See services menu

laser

hair removal can be tricky, thats why we make it simple with our awesome lineup of laser hair removal treatments like our bikini laser, full body laser, and much more.

See services menu
book now at this location

Check out our awesome reviews!

Fantastic and pretty painless wax services. Would highly recommend for those nervous about waxing and level of pain. Thank you to Yael and Winter.
Jordana Federal
1720234701
Will definitely be back bc the pros outweigh the cons but I had a couple issues. First, don’t call it a quickie mani and pedi when they are an hour each. People are busy and don't always want a drawn out experience. Taking TWICE as long as stated is... NOT ok.Secondly, neither my pedi or mani were dried properly. No dryer was used on either and I wasn't asked to wait for them to dry. Pedi didn't even make it out of the salon before a nail had to be redone (not my fault) and of course as soon as I got home may a finger smudged. Also the salon was too cold and it wasn't hot outside. The music was also terrible. Bad top 40 doesn't cut it in 2024. But like I said it will be my go to nail salon now, but hopefully some of these things can be remedied bc the salon and the staff were lovely.read more
Julia Longpre
1718755703
I just had a Brazilian wax with the most delightful Belgian esthetician. She was skilled, professional, quick and friendly! Wish I could go back and see her again but I don’t live in Vancouver.
Joanna Gray
1716580473
I recently got my nails done at this place and had a great experience. I walked in without an appointment and they were very professional, accommodating me by quickly finding a free spot. I was unsure about which color to choose, but they helped me... find the perfect one called Candy, which is easy to remember. Apart from nail services, they also offer laser treatments. The ambiance of the place is peaceful and calming, making it a perfect spot for self-care.read more
Negin Rahimi
1715213678
The staff are all so nice I sometimes think I come here just for the conversations. And of course they do great work too!! I am feeling truly pampered and can't wait for my next visit.
Veronika Smolik
1709485756
I come here for waxing. The first time I couldn’t get in at my regular spot so I booked in here, now I’ll only come here! I’ve seen both Makenzie and Anna a few times and both of them are great and make the whole experience super comfortable!I also... appreciate how convenient their online booking system is.read more
Erin M
1707686320
Reese is the best. I have had many services done by her (nails, facials, waxing). Always excellent. Definitely recommend booking in advance, but walked in once for an eyebrow wax with Winter, which was also great. Only wish there were more locations... in Metro Vancouver!!!read more
Sam C
1700594200
I made an appointment for a last minute pedicure on Sunday, and I’m so glad I did. I had been avoiding getting one due to a past experience.I was taken in by Norma, and right away I felt totally comfortable. I explained what I would like and she... was very professional and got to work on my feet. She had such a gentle touch, but also I could feel her experience.Norma was so focused on her work, it was a very relaxing experience. I will definitely be back. Also worth noting, the place was spotless. I mean SPOTLESS- also very friendly front reception. Great job everyoneread more
J H
1690860317
I’m so glad I picked this salon to get my holiday nails. It’s in a great location for transit and a cute neighbourhood. The staff is friendly and they were on time, no wait for my appointment. My manicurist, Samantha, was excellent! She helped me... pick out colours, took time to discuss what I wanted, and checked in with me at every step to ensure I was satisfied. I will absolutely go again! Very clean and lovely spot to get your nails done.read more
Valerie Zimmermann
1639875646
‹
›
